enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Commands to be executed by the YUNEEC MAV. They can be executed on user request, or as part of a mission script. If the action is used in a mission, the parameter mapping to the waypoint/mission message is as follows: Param 1, Param 2, Param 3, Param 4, X: Param 5, Y:Param 6, Z:Param 7. This command list is similar what ARINC 424 is for commercial aircraft: A data format how to interpret waypoint/mission data.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SMART_BATTERY
entry.param: Command ID for smart battery, as define by enum COMMAND_LIST
Communication status, 0 indicates not work, 1 indicates work.
Synchronize status, 0 indicates not asynchronous, 1 indicates synchronous.
Flying check, 0 indicates not flying, 1 indicates flying.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_OPTICAL_FLOW_UPGRADE
entry.description: Start the optical flow upgrade command.
entry.param: =0,Stop the optical flow upgrade;=1,Start the optical flow upgrade

entry.name: MAV_CMD_TEAM_MODE
entry.description: Switch Team Mode ON/OFF; OFF: One remote controls aircraft and gimbal; ON: The master remote controls the aircraft, the slave remote controls the gimbal.
entry.param: 0 = OFF Team Mode; 1 = ON Team Mode.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_EMERGENCY_BRAKE
entry.description: Emergency brake command. The drone will emergency braking without any acceleration limit.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_IPS_MODE
entry.description: Force ips (indoor position system) mode, using optical flow instead of GPS.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_MANUAL_MODE
entry.description: Force manual (altitude control) mode, disable position control and the drone is controlled manually.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SIMPLE_MOVE
entry.description: Make vehicle perform a simple move.
entry.param: Required distance of movement(in unit of 0.1m), or angle of turning(in degree)

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_ORBIT
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task
Around the radius, the unit is meters, range (5-50m)
Surround direction, =0 clockwise rotation,=1 Anticlockwise rotation.

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_POI
entry.description: Specify points of interest and fly around points of interest.
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task.
Around the radius, the unit is meters, range (5-50m)
Surround direction, =0 clockwise rotation, =1 Anticlockwise rotation.
Choose how to draw points of interest, =0 Manually draw points of interest, =1 Automatically draw points of interest.

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_JOUR
entry.description: Journey mode,from a point according to the set distance, velocity, flight video.
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task
One way flight distance, unit is meters, range (5-50m).
One way flight velocity, unit is m/s, range (1-10).

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_GPS_FOLLOW
entry.description: Move through the gps follow the target.
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task.
sub_mode, =0 follow me; =1 watch and follow me

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_CCC
entry.description: Spline Curves. Full name:Curve Cable Cam.
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task.

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_AUTO_RECORD
entry.param: =1, Pause the current task; =2 Continue/Start the current task

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_FACE_RECOGNITION
entry.param: =1 Pause the current task; =2 Continue/Start the current task.

entry.name: FLIGHT_TASK_VISUAL_TRACKING
entry.param: =1,Pause the current task; =2 Continue/start the current task
Sub-mode under the visual tracking,see enum (VISUAL_TRACKING_MODE).

entry.name: FIXED_VISUAL_TRACKING
entry.description: fixed visual tracking, only rotating UAV yaw and gimbal pitch without following.

entry.name: NORMAL_VISUAL_TRACKING
entry.description: normal visual tracking, both move UAV yaw and rotate gimbal pitch to follow.

entry.name: PARALLEL_VISUAL_TRACKING
entry.description: Keep a certain relative position to follow.

enum.name: CURVE_CABLE_CAM
enum.description: Sub-mode under the visual Curve Cable Cam.

enum.name: AUTO_RECORD
enum.description: Several sub modes under auto record

entry.name: DELAY_PHO_STR
entry.description: Delay photography plus straight line flight.

enum.name: SIMPLE_MOVE_TYPE
enum.description: Simple move types for command MAV_CMD_SIMPLE_MOVE.

entry.name: GO_LEFT
entry.description: Move to left in speed at 1m/s.

entry.name: GO_RIGHT
entry.description: Move to right in speed at 1m/s.

entry.name: EMERGENCY_STOP
entry.description: The aircraft emergency brake, and keep hovering.

entry.name: MAV_TASK_RESUME_ITEM
entry.description: After downloading the waypoint is lost, request the route to resume.

entry.name: MAV_TASK_ERROR
entry.description: generic error/not accepting task mission commands at all right now.

enum.name: TASK_ACTION
enum.description: The waypoint camera performs the action.

entry.name: TASK_WAITING
entry.description: The flight task mode is currently waiting

entry.name: TASK_RUNNING
entry.description: sThe flight task mode is currently running.

entry.name: TASK_FINISH
entry.description: The flight task mode is currently finished.

enum.name: TASK_CMD
enum.description: Flight tasks mode and state data display.

entry.name: TASK_ORBIT_MODE
entry.description: Flying around the user(orbit me mode).
entry.param: The distance from the vehicle to the point of interest, unit is m

entry.name: TASK_POI_MODE
entry.description: Specify points of interest and fly around points of interest(poi mode).
entry.param: The distance from the vehicle to the point of interest, unit is m

entry.name: TASK_JOUR_MODE
entry.description: Journey mode, from a point according to the set distance, velocity, flight video.

entry.name: TASK_GPS_FOLLOW_MODE
entry.description: Gps follow me mode, move through the gps follow the target.

entry.name: TASK_CCC_MODE
entry.description: CCC mode, spline Curves. Full name: Curve Cable Cam.
entry.param: Waypoint execute direction, =0 Positive movement, =1 Reverse movement.
The distance from the current waypoint to the next waypoint.

entry.name: MAV_RC_MSG_BYPASS_EX_PACKET
entry.description: Transfer Extra or Feedback of Aircraft Package

entry.name: BAT_COMMAND_LIST_DEEPSLEEP
entry.description: 0xA3 Host takes battery into deep sleep, only chargeing can wake battery up.

entry.name: BAT_COMMAND_LIST_GENERALINFO
entry.description: 0xA4 Host gets general Information of battery.

entry.name: BAT_COMMAND_LIST_COMMONINFO
entry.description: 0xA5 Host gets common information of battery.

entry.name: BAT_COMMAND_LIST_CONSTINFO
entry.description: 0xA6 Host gets sonstant information of battery.

entry.name: BAT_COMMAND_LIST_BOOTRESET
entry.description: 0xA7 Host gets sonstant information of battery.

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_TILT_ALIGNMENT
entry.description: True if the filter tilt alignment is complete

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_YAW_ALIGNMENT
entry.description: True if the filter yaw alignment is complete

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_GPS
entry.description: True if GPS measurements are being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_OPTICAL_FLOW
entry.description: True if optical flow measurements are being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_MAGNETIC_YAW
entry.description: True if a simple magnetic yaw heading is being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_MAGNETOMETER
entry.description: True if 3-axis magnetometer measurement are being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_SYNTHETIC_MAGNETIC
entry.description: True if synthetic magnetic declination measurements are being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_VEHICLE_AIRBORNE
entry.description: True when the vehicle is airborne

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_WIND_VELOCITY
entry.description: True when wind velocity is being estimated

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_BARO_ALT
entry.description: True when baro height is being fused as a primary height reference

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_RANGE_DISTANCE
entry.description: True when range finder height is being fused as a primary height reference

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_GPS_ALT
entry.description: True when GPS height is being fused as a primary height reference

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_LOCAL_POSITION_VISION
entry.description: True when local position data from extern_al vision is being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_YAW_VISION
entry.description: True when yaw data from external vision measurements is being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_ALT_VISION
entry.description: True when height data from external vision measurements is being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_SYNTHETIC_SIDESLIP
entry.description: True when synthetic sideslip measurements are being fused

entry.name: ESTIMATOR_UPDATED_MAGNETOMETER
entry.description: True when only the magnetic field states are updated by the magnetometer

message.name: VISUAL_TRACKING
message.description: The location of a visual tracking.
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds since boot or Unix epoch).
= 0: abnormal or lost; = 1: weak signal ; = 2: signal health.
The width of the visual target (no unit).
The height of the visual target (no unit).
Upper left coordinate value x (normalized, no unit).
Upper left coordinate value y (normalized, no unit).
Center coordinate value x (normalized, no unit).
Center coordinate value y (normalized, no unit).

message.name: TASK_UP_MIS
message.description: Upward link (CCC and POI)mission items.
message.field: waypoint sequence.
waypoint count.
waypoint latitude.
waypoint longitude.
waypoint altitude.
gimbal pitch value -1f..1f.
vehicle global yaw.
vehicle and camera execution. see enum(TASK_ACTION).
flight velocity, unit is meters.

message.name: TASK_DOWN_MIS
message.description: Down link (CCC and POI)mission items
message.field: waypoint sequence
waypoint count
waypoint latitude
waypoint longitude
waypoint altitude
gimbal pitch value -1f..1f
vehicle global yaw
vehicle and camera execution. see enum(TASK_ACTION).
flight velocity, unit is meters.

message.name: TASK_REQUEST_LIST
message.description: Request a waypoint command
message.field: System ID
Component ID
request list type, see enum(MAV_TASK_TYPE)

message.name: TASK_ACK
message.description: Ack message during task mission handling.The type field states if this message is a positive ack(result=0) or if an error happened(result=non-zero).
message.field: System ID
Component ID
ack result, see enum(MAV_TASK_RESULT)

message.name: TASK_STATE_FEEDBACK
message.description: Advanced function tasks mode and status feedback display.
message.field: Flight tasks mode, as defined by TASK_CMD enum
Flight tasks state, as defined by TASK_STATE enum
Parameter 1, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 2, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 3, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 4, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 5, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 6, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.
Parameter 7, as defined by TASK_CMD enum.

message.name: VISION_MODULES_VERSIONS
message.description: Vision modules versions message.
message.field: Optical flow software version
Optical flow hardware version
Realsense software version
Realsense hardware version

message.name: ESTIMATOR_MODE_ADDITIONS
message.description: Integer bitmask indicating which valid data of EKF is fused. This message is added until proper support is added upstream.
message.field: Estimator mode flags according to the ESTIMATOR_MODE_FLAGS enum.

message.name: NO_FLY_ZONE_UNLOCKING
message.description: Unlock key for no-fly zone. The string is 0 terminated, 33 bytes. We will decrypt this key and decide whether to cancel the no-fly zone check.
message.field: Unlock key for no-fly zone.

message.name: YUNEEC_OPTICAL_FLOW_RAD
message.description: Optical flow from an angular rate flow sensor (e.g. PX4FLOW or mouse sensor)
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds, synced to UNIX time or since system boot)
Sensor ID
Integration time in microseconds. Divide integrated_x and integrated_y by the integration time to obtain average flow. The integration time also indicates the.
Flow in radians around X axis (Sensor RH rotation about the X axis induces a positive flow. Sensor linear motion along the positive Y axis induces a negative flow.)
Flow in radians around Y axis (Sensor RH rotation about the Y axis induces a positive flow. Sensor linear motion along the positive X axis induces a positive flow.)
RH rotation around X axis (rad)
RH rotation around Y axis (rad)
RH rotation around Z axis (rad)
Temperature * 100 in centi-degrees Celsius
Optical flow quality / confidence. 0: no valid flow, 255: maximum quality
Time in microseconds since the distance was sampled.
Distance to the center of the flow field in meters. Positive value (including zero): distance known. Negative value: Unknown distance.
sonar sensitivity level. 0 means the lowest amplifier regulation level. 255 means the biggest level
optical flow luminance. 0 means the lowest brightness and 255 means the highest brightness. No specific unit for it.
count of sonar distance capture

message.name: EXPOSURE_INFO_REQUEST
message.description: Request all information cached by exposure event of this component. After this request, all information are emitted.
message.field: System ID
Component ID

message.name: EXPOSURE_INFO_ACK
message.description: Response from a EXPOSURE_INFO_REQUEST message.
message.field: [us] Time in UTC, 0 for unknown
[deg] Latitude (WGS84)
[deg] Longitude (WGS84)
[mm] Altitude (MSL). Positive for up
[rad] Gimbal roll angle (-pi..+pi)
[rad] Gimbal pitch angle (-pi..+pi)
[rad] Gimbal yaw angle (-pi..+pi)

message.name: GIMBAL_CONTROL
message.description: Gimbal control packet from flight control.
message.field: drone's quaternion, multiplied by 10000.
drone's horizontal velocity in cm/s unit.
drone's horizontal acceleration in cm/s/s unit.
Current yaw angular rate in of drone in 0.1*degrees/second.

yaw channel value,value range 0-4096,follow point ahead mode is none;degree = -((channel_value-2048)*0.03dgree+45dgree); velocity=-(channel_value-2130)/41 or velocity=-(channel_value-1966)/41 there has a lsb deadline.

pitch channel value,value range 0-4096,follow point ahead mode is none;degree = -((channel_value-2048)*0.03dgree+45dgree); velocity=-(channel_value-2130)/41 or velocity=-(channel_value-1966)/41 there has a lsb deadline.

roll channel value,value range 0-4096,follow point ahead mode is none;degree = -((channel_value-2048)*0.03dgree+45dgree); velocity=-(channel_value-2130)/41 or velocity=-(channel_value-1966)/41 there has a lsb deadline.

yaw mode value, 410-820 is mode :follow point ahead;820-1229 is mode:follow point angle changeable, 1229-1638 is mode:follow point velocity changeable,2048-2458 is mode:global angle changeable, 2867-3686 is mode: global velocity changeable.

pitch mode value, 410-820 is mode :follow point ahead;820-1229 is mode:follow point angle changeable, 1229-1638 is mode:follow point velocity changeable,2048-2458 is mode:global angle changeable, 2867-3686 is mode: global velocity changeable.

roll mode value, 410-820 is mode :follow point ahead;820-1229 is mode:follow point angle changeable, 1229-1638 is mode:follow point velocity changeable,2048-2458 is mode:global angle changeable, 2867-3686 is mode: global velocity changeable.

message.name: GIMBAL_CONTROL_STANDARD
message.description: This packet is standard Gimbal control packet from remote controller or cell phone.
message.field: the priority of this control packet.range is 1~253,1 is the highest and 253 is lowest;self-control is 1,the packet send by GIMBAL_CONTROL is 10,and the packet send by GIMBAL_DEBUGDATA is 20,the others number belong to user.
yaw mode value,1 is follow_head,2 is follow_angle,3 is follow_velocity;4 is global_angle,5 is global_velocity.
pitch mode value,1 is follow_head,2 is follow_angle,3 is follow_velocity;4 is global_angle,5 is global_velocity.
roll mode value,1 is follow_head,2 is follow_angle,3 is follow_velocity;4 is global_angle,5 is global_velocity.
yaw channel value,if yaw mode is angle ,this value is angle.if yaw mode is velocity,this value is velocity..
pitch channel value,if pitch mode is angle ,this value is angle.if pitch mode is velocity,this value is velocity..
roll channel value,if roll mode is angle ,this value is angle.if roll mode is velocity,this value is velocity..
drone's yaw desired anguler velocity.

message.name: GIMBAL_DEBUGDATA
message.description: Gimbal to PC, Gimbal debugdata packet(50 bytes).
message.field: gimbal debudata type.
gimbal debudata.

message.name: BOOTLOAD_DATA
message.description: Gimbal bootload data packet(133 bytes).
message.field: gimbal bootload data.

message.name: GIMBAL_ADDITIONAL_ATTITUDE
message.description: Gimbal additional attitude data required by the camera.
message.field: timesmap
Roll angle relative to vehicle in degrees.
Pitch angle relative to vehicle in degrees.
Global yaw angle estimate in degrees.

message.name: UPDATE_STATUS_FEEDBACK
message.description: Update status feedback for modules.
message.field: System ID
Component ID
update module name, 1 is autopilot, 2 is gimbal, 3 is camera, 4 is remote controller, 5 is opticalflow, 6 is OTA bundle firmware
update status, 0 is ready, 1 is in progress, 2 is finished, 3 is failed
update progress(percentage), value range 0-100, the real value is progress*0.01f

message.name: MAV_RC_CMD
message.description: MAV RC command.

message.name: MAV_RC_CMD_ACK
message.description: MAV RC command ACK.

message.name: BAT_GENERAL_INFO
message.description: command of host to battery.
message.field: the full battery capacity in units mAh, it will reduce with usage.
the predicted remaining battery capacity in units mAh.
the current capacity in percentage of capacity.
the temperature of battery in units Centigrade.
the pack voltage in units mV.
sum of each cell voltage in units mV.
each cell voltage in units mV.
the State-of-Health information of the battery in percentage of design capacity and design energy.
the warning items in discharge mode.
the state of the key,which 0x00 indicates pulling up and 0xff indicates pulling down.
the charge-discharge cycle number.
the maximum voltage of each cell has ever been experienced in units mV.
the minimum voltage of each cell has ever been experienced in units mV.
the max temperature of the battery has ever been experienced in units Centigrade.
the minimum temperature of the battery has ever been experienced in units Centigrade.
the max charging current of the battery has ever been experienced in units 10mA.
the max discharging current of the battery has ever been experienced in units 10mA.
the overcharge times of the battery.

message.name: BAT_COMMON_INFO
message.description: command of host to battery.
message.field: the predicted remaining battery capacity in units mAh.
the current capacity in percentage of design capacity.
the temperature of battery in units Centigrade.
the pack voltage in units mV.
each cell voltage in units mV.
the measured current from coulomb counter in units 10mA.
the warning items in discharge mode.
the state of the key,which 0x00 indicates pulling up and 0xff indicates pulling down.

message.name: BAT_CONST_INFO
message.description: The host sends the constant information to battery, the information indicate importent attribution.
message.field: firmwareVersion. version 101 means 1.01
bootloaderVersion.version 101 means 1.01
hardwareVersion.version 101 means 1.01
firmwareSize.the value of application in bytes
MCU type.
Name of our company
The Cells of battery
The battery design capacity in units mAh

message.name: BAT_PRODUCTION_INFO
message.description: Used to load the production information form PC when manufacture.
message.field: Production time
Key for checking whether the battery is legal.
